title: Port Forwarding Question
body: My internet connection works perfectly fine (able to surf web, etc.) but I cant seem to play any video games online including League of Legends. So I tried port Forwarding and maybe this is the issue? I cant seem to add Ports 5223 and 5222 which is apparently important? Can someone help or maybe find another solution to my problem?

replies.body:
Are you running into a specific error when trying to forward those ports? [**This website**](https://portforward.com/router.htm) can help guide you with forwarding these ports and has screenshots for most Modem/Router Brands.

Let me know if this helped.
